title: Professional Network
milestoneGoal: Your professional network includes anyone who can speak to your good qualities and connect you with opportunities. We'll show you how to develop this network into a powerful tool for job hunting.

content.content: Choose one of these activities to get started on your Professional Network milestone:

A professional network is a group of people who are connected for business or career reasons. Networking is seeking out and taking care of relationships with people who can help you achieve your goals.

The people in your network are familiar with your skills, experience, or work ethic — or they’re directly connected with someone who can speak to these things.

content.heading: An effective network is built on trust and mutual support.
content.subheading: There’s a give and take to networking, and you can expect to be on either side at different times. You could turn to your network for things like:
items: Seeing if someone has a connection at a company you’re interested in
Finding an accountant to help with your taxes
Getting advice on whether to attend a conference
Sharing a job posting that looks like a good fit for someone you know

content.heading: Building a strong network takes time, but it doesn’t need to be difficult.
content.subheading: Even if the idea of networking makes you queasy — as it does for some of us — you’re not alone. We’re here to help you get going.
